details: DOMPurify is used before injecting Markdown HTML. `noopener noreferrer` is properly applied to external links.
Mermaid SVG output is injected directly via innerHTML. We rely on Mermaid.js security. Consider running DOMPurify on the generated SVG as a defense-in-depth measure.
No Content Security Policy (CSP) meta tag in index.html. Allows unrestricted script loading.
recommendation: Implement strict CSP allowing only 'self' and trusted CDNs (Google Fonts).

details: User content is stored in localStorage in plain text. Standard for client-side apps but implies no confidentiality on shared devices.
